name: Scar
subtitle: Heartless Hunter
author: Alexandria Neonakis

additional_info.title: Not inkable
additional_info.body: The EN Version of this card has a small bug - this card is normaly not inkable - we will fix this with the next update

flavor_text: It’s for the greater good. I’m sure you understand. —Scar
rules_text: TEETH AND AMBITIONS When you play this character, deal 2 damage to chosen character of yours to deal 2 damage to another chosen character.
